meanings.sent1: The ventriculi of the birds were filled with food.
meanings.sent2: The doctor studied the ventriculi of the patients carefully.
meanings.sent3: The ventriculi of the frogs seemed to be singing in harmony.
meanings.sent4: The ventriculi of the building stored the memories of its past.
meanings.sent5: The ventriculi of the machine hummed with energy.

meanings.sent1: She observed the ventriculi of the fish in the aquarium.
meanings.sent2: The scientist examined the ventriculi of the specimens under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The ventriculi of the toy robots seemed to be communicating secretly.
meanings.sent4: The ventriculi of the city held the dreams of its inhabitants.
meanings.sent5: The ventriculi of the clock ticked rhythmically.
